attachments.title: In a world of me-first smart home gear, can smarthubs make them all play nice?
attachments.text: Review: We automate this old house with the Revolv and SmartThings smarthubs.
attachments.fallback: Ars Technica: In a world of me-first smart home gear, can smarthubs make them all play nice?

text: the tl:dr from that article is that (1) the Revolv hub is awesome, (2) the SmartThings hub is less great, (3) a Wemo outlet by itself is a pain to set up.
